Microsoft has announced it'll be holding this year's Xbox Games Showcase on 11th June.

articles.title: Great Mysteries of Physics 1: is time an illusion? - The Conversation
articles.description: Physics makes a lot of assumptions about time that may be getting in the way of understanding the fourth dimension.
articles.content: Without a sense of time, leading us from cradle to grave, our lives would make little sense. But on the most fundamental level, physicists arent sure whether the sort of time we experience exists at … [+3552 chars]

articles.title: Early childhood lower respiratory tract infection and premature adult death from respiratory disease in Great Britain: a national birth cohort study - The Lancet
articles.description:
In this prospective, life-spanning, nationally representative cohort study, LRTI during
early childhood was associated with almost a two times increased risk of premature
adult death from respiratory disease, and accounted for one-fifth of these deaths.
